subject: Genearting JUnit HTML reports
msgSnippet: Currently generating junit reports (*.txt and *.xml files) using maven- surefire-plugin. Wondering is there way to display these reports in HTML format? Thanks
messageBody:
Currently generating junit reports (*.txt and *.xml files) using maven-
surefire-plugin. Wondering is there way to display these reports in
HTML format?

Thanks in advance,
raja.
